wire around a work 25 more chain finish off tie a knot halfway down leg to form pencil to form lenses bend wire back to form spectacle legs trim knee use end of yarn to stitch toes together firmly at ankle the and position by pushing wire into toy stuffing stitch in place if other end of yarn will be used to sew leg to body necessary making up comb sew the cast on edge of base to the centre 16sts of body now sew using a 3 25mm us d3 crochet hook and a colour of your choosing left and right sides of base to left and right sides of body start at work 30 chain use the yarn ends to sew in place there are three loops base and using mattress stitch sew 3cm up back seam sew the legs one behind the other in the comb each loop is 10 chain in place at front two corners you can also form a loop of 10ch under the beak optional fill the base of chicken with popcorn kernels or plastic beans 1-2cm deep now stuff the body with toy stuffing stitch the tail remainder of the seam sew the beak in place and two black beads using a 3 25mm us d3 crochet hook and as many colours as for eyes wished work a selection of chain lengths from 15 to 30 sts long using a simple running stitch and different
